articles.title: BMW’s Digital Key Plus will let iPhones unlock the iX from a pocket or bag - The Verge
articles.description: BMW has announced an upgraded version of its mobile car key technology dubbed Digital Key Plus. It promises to allow iPhone owners to unlock select BMW cars without having to take their phones from their pockets.
articles.content:
Using the ultra wideband chip that debuted in the iPhone 11 
BMWs all-electric iX will be first to support the Digital Key Plus feature.
